objects.text:
• Hand-crafted premium leather construction
• Intricate scalloped pattern and stitching
• Cushioned footbed for all-day comfort
• Durable rubber outsole for enhanced grip

product_details.name: Enchanted Desert Wanderer - Artisan Leather Comfort Sneaker
product_details.description:
• Hand-crafted premium leather construction with unique desert-inspired design
• Intricate scalloped pattern and decorative stitching details
• Soft breathable interior with moisture-wicking lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture for enhanced grip
• Cushioned footbed for all-day comfort
• Two-tone color scheme in warm sandy beige and caramel brown
• Traditional lace-up closure with bronze-toned eyelets
• Distinctive heel counter design for added stability
• Perfect blend of artistic style and practical comfort
• Versatile casual wear suitable for both indoor and outdoor activities

banner_details:
This banner showcases a promotional design for a premium product, centered around a hand-crafted leather sneaker. The layout features a bold, attention-grabbing heading (`heading`) positioned at the top, reflecting the adventurous theme. Just below it, the subheading (`subheading`) presents the product type in a strong sans-serif font, supported by a decorative line (`decorative`) beneath it. A concise product feature list (`description`) communicates key selling points with neat bullet points for clarity. A vibrant promotional tagline (`tagline`) prompts urgency, followed by a large, prominent price tag (`price`). The call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) is rectangular with rounded corners. To the right, the sneaker graphic (`product_image`) draws visual focus. Background elements feature layered borders and patterns in soft earth tones.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5EFE6 (Warm beige)
- Accent: #C8A27A (Soft tan)
- Headline: #9C5221 (Bold brown)
- Sub-Headline & CTA: #BD7B4F (Terracotta)
- Body Text: #6D4C35 (Earthy brown)
- Tagline: #D35400 (Burnt orange)
- Button Text: #FFFFFF (White)
product_color: The product image showcases a creative sneaker with a warm, autumn-inspired color palette centered around earthy and creamy tones. Key colors include caramel brown (#A0522D), burnt orange (#CC5500), warm beige (#F5DEB3), and creamy ivory (#FFF8E7). These colors are well-blended through layered stitching and gradients, giving depth and a handcrafted aesthetic. Burnt orange laces add contrast and focus, drawing the eye. The beige and ivory base supports intricate design elements, while the darker shades bring out the contours and patterns. A banner using this palette can evoke comfort, craftsmanship, and style, appealing to lovers of unique and artisanal fashion.
